head.title: HoloWeb
head.description: This project aims to bring Holograms online: Easy to use for everyone + developer-friendly. A user should be able to display a hologramâ€¦

body:
This project aims to bring Holograms online: Easy to use for everyone + developer-friendly.

A user should be able to display a hologram application on every device - be it a smartphone, a tablet, a laptop, an office pc or even a Raspberry PI. The only thing needed is a webbrowser, and, well, some plastic - even watches run browsers nowadays.

#
